channel.title: All News on TWH @ Utah
channel.description: Recent content in All News on TWH @ Utah

item.title: Open PhD and Postdoc Positions
item.description: I am looking for PhD/Postdoc who are interested in Computer and Software Systems research. Please visit hiring details.

item.title: One paper accepted by 2019 IEEE IPDPS
item.description: Congratulations! Our paper “Cpp-Taskflow: Fast Task-based Parallel Programming using Modern C++” has been accepted by the 33rd IEEE International Parallel and Distributed Processing Symposium (IPDPS)!

item.title: Two papers accepted by 2019 IEEE/ACM DAC
item.description: Congratulations! Our papers “A General Cache Framework for Efficient Generation of Timing Critical Paths” and “Essential Building Blocks for Creating an Open-source EDA Project“ have been accepted by 2019 IEEE/ACM Design Automation Conference (DAC)!

item.title: OpenTimer received the best open-source tool award
item.description: Congratulations! Our research project OpenTimer has been awarded the Best Open-source EDA Tool in 2018 WOSET at ICCAD!

item.title: DtCraft received the best open-source tool award
item.description: Congratulations! Our research project DtCraft has been awarded the Best Open-source EDA Tool in 2018 ACM Multimedia Conference (MM). We are highlighted by the CSL at UIUC - CSL team develops award-winning cluster computing software.

item.title: First Place in 2017 ACM SIGDA CADathlon
item.description: Congratulations! Tsung-Wei Huang and Chun-Xun Lin won the First Place in ACM CADathlon International Programming Contest! See CADathlon Hall of Fame.
